message: Some housekeeping before we get started... if at any time you wish to start over, you can click 'exit' icon in the top right corner of the window.

If you want an unguided tour, you can click the 'image' icon in the top right corner. I promise not to be offended... much. I only put a lot of time and effort into the presentation of this, so TOTALLY no hard feelings if you don't want me here. None. Nada. OK, maybe just a little bit.
action1: I absolutely want the guided tour!

message: Oh, Great! Another tip: when viewing a specific artwork during the guided tour you can click on it to view it in high resolution in a new tab.
And finally, it appears you've already figured it out, but progressing through the gallery is simply a matter of choosing one of the options below.
action1: Yea, I'm not an idiot, js.

message: Oh, right. Sorry. OK then, let's tell you a little bit about what we have in store for you today, shall we?
Our gallery is displaying two themed exhibitions today. 'Perpendicular Facades' focuses on street photography. 'Warmth in Winter' features warm colored abstract art.
action1: 2 exhibitions?? Wow! You killed it, js!

message: Why thank you! The entire gallery - both exhibitions combined - came in UNDER budget at 9.99 SOL!

Well, you know what they say: 0.01 SOL saved is 0.01 SOL earned.  The gallery also contains only 2 editions, 33% below the limit! Anyways, enough mind-blowing mathematics... which exhibition do you wish to view first?
